{"id":1271458191,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1716991106,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1206 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1271458191/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"293.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int st , end , n = nums.size() ;\n        vector<vector<int>> res;\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        set<vector<int>> s;\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){\n            st=i+1;end=n-1;\n            while(st < end){\n                if(nums[i] + nums[st] + nums[end] < 0 )\n                    st++;\n                else if(nums[i] + nums[st] + nums[end] > 0 )\n                    end--;\n                else if(nums[i] + nums[st] + nums[end] == 0){\n                     s.insert({nums[i],nums[st],nums[end]});\n                    st++;\n                    end--;\n                }\n            }\n            \n        }\n\n        for(auto triplets : s)\n            res.push_back(triplets);\n        return res;\n\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
